item.title: All About Git and Github in RStudio: A Step-by-Step Guide for Beginners Like Me (With Pictures!)
item.description: Git Newbie Commit, Push, and Pull Let’s Git It On! Create an account in Github Once we have an account, we can immediately create a repository. Configure Git in R Studio Create new project with version control Copy Repository URL and Create Project Git Up, Git Down R Studio’s Easy Git Interface. First Commit Push the Changes Make changes in the Repository Pull the Changes Create README File Same Steps Git Newbie As a novice programmer, I realized that code can go from bad to worse just because of minimal changes.
